# PTD Today — Daily Intelligence Brief  
**Date:** 2026-01-02  

---

## 1) Top Themes  
- Fatal fire incident at Swiss ski resort bar during New Year’s celebration  
- NYC Mayor Mamdani launching a housing agenda aligned with a democratic socialist platform  
- Political and legal videos featuring high-profile figures (Trump and Jack Smith)  
- New Year’s celebrations around the Middle East  
- Live and ongoing coverage of crisis events  

---

## 2) Top Stories  
- NYC Mayor Mamdani announces his initial executive orders focused on housing as part of his new administration’s agenda (Source: Reuters).  
- Mayor Mamdani pledges to implement a democratic socialist policy framework in NYC (Source: Reuters).  
- Dozens killed and over 100 injured in a deadly fire at a Swiss ski resort bar during New Year’s party, with ongoing live coverage of the scene (Sources: CNN, Reuters).  
- A New Year catastrophe at the Swiss ski resort has resulted in numerous presumed deaths (Source: CNN).  
- Spectacular New Year celebrations have taken place across the Middle East (Source: Reuters).  
- Political figures’ videos released: Trump discussing heart health, and Jack Smith deposition footage made public (Sources: CNN).
